author: barnabasbusa
content:
We have now integrated Grandine into our testing setups:

**Kurtosis**: 
- Grandine: https://github.com/kurtosis-tech/ethereum-package/blob/main/src/cl/grandine/grandine_launcher.star
- PR: https://github.com/kurtosis-tech/ethereum-package/pull/517
**ansible-collections:**
- Grandine: https://github.com/ethpandaops/ansible-collection-general/blob/master/roles/grandine/README.md
- PR: https://github.com/ethpandaops/ansible-collection-general/pull/212
**template-devnets:**
- Grandine: https://github.com/ethpandaops/template-devnets/blob/master/ansible/inventories/devnet-0/group_vars/grandine.yaml
- PR: https://github.com/ethpandaops/template-devnets/pull/33
**ethereum-helm-charts:**
- Grandine: https://github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-helm-charts/tree/master/charts/grandine
- PR: https://github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-helm-charts/pull/187
**eth-client-docker-image-builder: **
- Grandine: https://github.com/ethpandaops/eth-client-docker-image-builder/actions/workflows/build-push-grandine.yml
- PR: https://github.com/ethpandaops/eth-client-docker-image-builder/pull/137
**Additional supported tools that inherit the above prs:**
- All new ** feature devnets ** - pectra devnets (hopefully coming soon ™️ )
- **Assertoor** testing
- **Xatu** network related information
- All small private devnets on kurtosis

author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: Kudos to <@412614104222531604> and the crew! If anyone has any issues using Grandine or any questions - let me know, happy to answer.
